verses.verse: (A <S%H7692>Shiggaion<s%> of David, which he sang to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> concerning Cush, a Benjamite.) O Lord my <S%H430>God,<s%> in Thee I have <S%H2620>taken<s%> <S%H2620>refuge;<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me from <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H7291>pursue<s%> me, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me,
<S%H6435>Lest<s%> he <S%H2963>tear<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> like a <S%H9030>lion,<s%> <S%H6561>Dragging<s%> me <S%H6561>away,<s%> while <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is <S%H5766>injustice<s%> in my <S%H3709>hands,<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> I have <S%H1580>rewarded<s%> <S%H9563>evil<s%> to my <S%H7999>friend,<s%> Or have <S%H2502>plundered<s%> him who <S%H7387>without<s%> <S%H7387>cause<s%> was my <S%H6887>adversary,<s%>

Let the <S%H340>enemy<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> [it]; And let him <S%H7429>trample<s%> my <S%H9132>life<s%> <S%H7429>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> And <S%H7931>lay<s%> my <S%H9202>glory<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in Thine <S%H639>anger;<s%> <S%H5375>Lift<s%> up Thyself against the <S%H5678>rage<s%> of my <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> And <S%H5782>arouse<s%> Thyself for me; Thou hast <S%H6680>appointed<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
And let the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> of the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> <S%H5437>encompass<s%> Thee; And <S%H5921>over<s%> them <S%H7725>return<s%> Thou on <S%H4791>high.<s%>

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1777>judges<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> <S%H8199>Vindicate<s%> me, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> according to my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and my <S%H8537>integrity<s%> that is in me.

<S%H4994>O<s%> let the <S%H9563>evil<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1584>come<s%> to an <S%H1584>end,<s%> but <S%H3559>establish<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> For the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H974>tries<s%> the <S%H3820>hearts<s%> and <S%H3629>minds.<s%>
My <S%H4043>shield<s%> is with <S%H430>God,<s%> Who <S%H3467>saves<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H8199>judge,<s%> And a <S%H410>God<s%> who has <S%H2194>indignation<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H518>If<s%> a man does not <S%H7725>repent,<s%> He will <S%H3913>sharpen<s%> His <S%H2719>sword;<s%> He has <S%H1869>bent<s%> His <S%H7198>bow<s%> and <S%H3559>made<s%> it <S%H3559>ready.<s%>
He has also <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for Himself <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H3627>weapons;<s%> He <S%H6466>makes<s%> His <S%H2671>arrows<s%> <S%H1814>fiery<s%> <S%H1814>shafts.<s%>
He has <S%H3738>dug<s%> a <S%H953>pit<s%> and <S%H2658>hollowed<s%> it out, And has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> into the <S%H7845>hole<s%> which he <S%H6466>made.<s%>
His <S%H5999>mischief<s%> will <S%H7725>return<s%> upon his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> And his <S%H2555>violence<s%> will <S%H3381>descend<s%> upon his own <S%H6936>pate.<s%>

I will <S%H3034>give<s%> <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> according to His <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And will <S%H2167>sing<s%> <S%H2167>praise<s%> to the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9411>Most<s%> <S%H9411>High.<s%>
